# `DocumentChunkBlock` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | The globally unique identifier for the chunk. |
| text | `string` | Yes | The chunk text associated with the variation. |
| confidence | `number` | No | The confidence associated with a chunk with respect to a search query. |
| document | [`DocumentChunkReference`](documentchunkreference-definition.md) | No | Reference to document associated with a chunk |
